channel.title: Installation on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: OnPrem
item.description: Installation OnPrem You will receive the objects for the Connector 365 Base & SMTP2FAX App from us by mail. In order to be able to use the App, they must first be published and then installed. Publishing the Connector 365 Base & SMTP2FAX App Publishing the Connector Base & SMTP2FAX App is done via the Business Central Administration Shell. First transfer the files we sent to you to the server where your Business Central instance is running.
